panels.description:
brenner uebersicht: 
-3 saugen
AUTOMATISCH_BRENNT_NICHT = 0
    BRENNER_STARTET = -10
    AUSGESCHALTET_DURCH_BENUTZER = -20
    ASCHE_VOLL = -30
    KEINE_PELLETS = -40
    STOERUNG_EINMESSEN = -50
    KEINE_MODUBUS_VERBINDUNG = -100
    PROGRAMMIERFEHLER = -200

targets.query:
from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  //|> filter(fn: (r) =>  r._field =~ /^sp_ladung_zentral.*_level_prozent$/ or r._field =~ /^sp_ladung_zentral.*_prozent$/ or r._field =~ /^brenner_(1|2)_uebersicht_prozent$/  or r._field =~ /^haeuser_ladung_minimum_prozent$/ or r._field =~ /^_brenner_(1|2)_modulation_soll_prozent$/ or r._field == "haeuser_ladung_avg_prozent" or r._field == "betrieb_notheizung_prozent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r._field =~ /^sp_ladung_zentral_prozent$/ 
  or r._field =~ /^brenner_(1|2)_uebersicht_prozent$/  
  or r._field =~ /^haeuser_ladung_minimum_prozent$/ 
  or r._field =~ /^_brenner_(1|2)_modulation_soll_prozent$/ 
  or r._field == "betrieb_notheizung_prozent"
  or r._field == "haeuser_ladung_avg_prozent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.etappe =~ /^${etappe:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "distinct")

panels.title: Übersicht

targets.query:
from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r._field =~ /^actiontimer.*_min$/ or r._field =~ /^*_valve_open_count$/ or r._field == "sp_zentral_steigung")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.etappe =~ /^${etappe:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "distinct")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^hausreihe.*kWh$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.etappe =~ /^${etappe:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^zentral_(temperature|error)_/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.etappe =~ /^${etappe:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^mischventil_(stellwert|credit)_/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.etappe =~ /^${etappe:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^mischventil_power_W$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.etappe =~ /^${etappe:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^mischventil_fluss_m3_h$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.etappe =~ /^${etappe:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  //|> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "sp_verbrauch_W" or r._field == "sp_verbrauch_avg_W")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^${verbrauch:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.etappe =~ /^${etappe:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.haus =~ /^${haus:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => if exists r.reihe then r.reihe =~ /^${reihe:regex}$/ else true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^mbus_dezentral_temperature_t(1|2)_C$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.etappe =~ /^${etappe:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.haus =~ /^${haus:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>if exists r.reihe then r.reihe =~ /^${reihe:regex}$/ else true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "mbus_dezentral_flow_v1_m3h")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.etappe =~ /^${etappe:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.haus =~ /^${haus:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => if exists r.reihe then r.reihe =~ /^${reihe:regex}$/ else true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^sp_(unten|mitte|oben)_error_C$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.etappe =~ /^${etappe:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.haus =~ /^${haus:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => if exists r.reihe then r.reihe =~ /^${reihe:regex}$/ else true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^sp_(unten|mitte|oben)_(a|b)_ok_percent$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.etappe =~ /^${etappe:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.haus =~ /^${haus:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => if exists r.reihe then r.reihe =~ /^${reihe:regex}$/ else true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "modbus_ok_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.etappe =~ /^${etappe:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.haus =~ /^${haus:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => if exists r.reihe then r.reihe =~ /^${reihe:regex}$/ else true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  // |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: Dezentral Modbus History Percent OK (100% not shown)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "uptime_s")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.etappe =~ /^${etappe:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.haus =~ /^${haus:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => if exists r.reihe then r.reihe =~ /^${reihe:regex}$/ else true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "next_legionellen_kill_d")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.etappe =~ /^${etappe:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.haus =~ /^${haus:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => if exists r.reihe then r.reihe =~ /^${reihe:regex}$/ else true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "rutschbahnhaus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_measurement"] == "pico_ria")
//  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "anforderung" or  r._field == "zwangsladung")
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_measurement"] == "pico_ria" and r._field == "anforderung" or  r._field == "zwangsladung")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: distinct, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "distinct")

panels.title: Puent: Anforderung und Zwangsladung, alte Heizung, gemessen

targets.query:
from(bucket: "rutschbahnhaus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>  r["_measurement"] == "pico_anna")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "anforderung" or  r._field == "zwangsladung")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: distinct, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "distinct")

panels.title: Bochs: Anforderung und Zwangsladung, alte Heizung (gemessen)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^temp_oekofen_.*_C$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.etappe =~ /^${etappe:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "heizung")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^temp_oekofen_.*_MODE$/ or r._field =~ /^temp_oekofen_.*MODULATION_PROCENT$/ or r._field =~ /^temp_oekofen_.*_STATE$/  or r._field =~ /^temp_oekofen_.*_CONTR$/  or r._field =~ /^temp_oekofen_.*RUNTIME$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.etappe =~ /^${etappe:regex}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: "heizung",
    tag: "etappe",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d
)
list.label: Etappe
list.name: etappe

    bucket: "heizung",

v1.tagValues(

    predicate: (r) => r.etappe =~ /^${etappe:regex}$/,
    start: -1d
